meanings.definition: The cost required for something; the money spent on something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully tracked her expenses to stay within her budget.
meanings.sent2: The company's expenses increased due to unexpected repairs.
meanings.sent3: The cat's expenses on toys and treats were higher than the owner's!
meanings.sent4: His extravagant lifestyle led to expenses piling up like a mountain.
meanings.sent5: Keeping a record of your daily expenses can help manage your finances better.

meanings.definition: The act or process of spending money.
meanings.sent1: Her expenses on clothes were higher than usual this month.
meanings.sent2: The expenses for the project were carefully monitored by the team.
meanings.sent3: The magician's expenses on props seemed to magically disappear!
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, expenses can make or break a company.
meanings.sent5: Learning to differentiate between needs and wants can reduce unnecessary expenses.
